location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch Map of Islands in the Lower Red Sea

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; black ink on paper.Dimensions: 210 x 171mm.

mods.abstract: Sketch map depicting islands in the Lower Red Sea, including the Farsan Islands [Jazā’ir Farasān] towards the north and the Hanish Islands towards the south. The map also shows the surrounding region, including Eritrea in the west and Asir and Yemen in the east. Author unknown.
